mng: respectful, solemn, to eliminate, to clean up

exm.mng: Gansu province, abbr. 甘[Gan1], short name 隴|陇[Long3], capital Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1]
Gansu province (Kansu) between Xinjiang and Inner Mongolia in north China, abbr. 隴|陇[Lǒng] or 甘[gān], capital Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lán zhōu]
to feel deep veneration for sb (idiom)
strict, serious, solemn, dignified, to tidy upto clean up, to purge, to adjust
austere, stern, harsh, somber and desolate (autumn or winter)
standing tall and majestic (of physical object such as trees)
silence, solemnly silent, peaceful, to pacify
